title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.26 - Adoptive placements across State and county jurisdictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.26 - Adoptive placements across State and county jurisdictions

State Regulations

An authorized agency may not delay or deny the placement
of a child freed for adoption with otherwise suitable approved adoptive parents
on the basis that the approved adoptive parents reside in a state or county
different from that of the authorized agency with custody and guardianship of
the child. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
421.26

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
